Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume II

bibl.note: Defining an archive. - Compiling a list of archives. - Towards a typology. - Why collections do matter. - Technical realisations: a database-driven website. - Conclusion.
VAN BEEK Bart, Ancient Archives and Modern Collections. The Leuven Homepage of Papyrus Archives and Collections.

Jaakko FRÖSÉN, Tiina PUROLA and Erja SALMENKIVI (Edd.), Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume II = Commentationes Humanarum Litterarum. 122, 2, 2007 (Helsinki, 2007) pp. 1033-1044.
